text: "ethakota mama hithaganta oona uu eeka pimbainne nathuwama mala kiyalada?
owun me wanawitath wahanaye salasuma sada awasanayi.
aththata ma man mawa godananguwe poth path asure.
panatha pawa aluthin sanshodhanaya karanawa.
oba ayiyage as dekanam latheth gathiyak thiyenawa..kruthima sinchanayen eha yayido manda ?!!!!
eheth meki janatha udghoshana mardanaye wagakima polisiya pita patawima saba wagakiwayuththan nidos kirimak wanneya.
lajjanathi para haththa.
mahanagara ha basnahira sanwardhana amathyanshaye ghana apadrawya kalamanakarana wyapruthiya magin kriyathmaka ...
bota pissu ooyi.
onna ada udema kattiya puduma wena deyak denna yanne, meka oyalata godak prayojanawath weyi..
obe adahasata garu karanawa.
mewa hada ganna kramawedayak thiyenna oona.
jawipe asu gananwala aga bhagayedi gena wyaparaya aththatama suluthara janawargayakata deshapalana balaya bedimata wiruddha wyaparayak.

mathalan, yamak nodannawanam ee gana igena ganna.
“puhunuwim kirime palamu dinaya tikak amaruyi thama.
thawath tikakin putha putha kiyala katha kara kara dorata gahanawa.
api kiwwa meka thamunnanselata mita issara, eda kiwwa meka achcharuwak, meka kada haliyak.
enisa waga kata­yuthu poddak passata giya.
athithaya piriksanne nam meya ada pamanak athi pa්rashnayak nowana bawa wataha ganu atha.
indu lanka giwisuma kriyathmaka wimath samangama ehi kondesiyak yatathe athadanguwata gath siyalu dena 1988 aprel 22wanida nidahas wuha.

mowun mema sthanayata ragenawith aththe aandu pakshayata ayath amathiwaran bawata wirodhatha karawanma sidu kala kathawalin pahadili wiya.(mehi widiyo pataya thulin eya pahadili we – itha ikmanin mehi widiyowa wikalpa thulin balaporoththu wanna)

lankawe prasiddha kata nowa kuduya.

yam heyakin palamu wiwahaya sidu karagath pirimi pudgalayeku dewani wiwahayata kamathi wuwath, palamu birinda dewani wiwahayata kamathi nowanne nam ema palamu birindata sira danduwam laba dime hakiyawa mema panatha magin labi thibe.

makansi liwimata hapaniyaki.
obata yamak dana ganimata awashyanami apage nila samibandha kara ganimi kramawalin onama awasthawaka apa samibandha kara gatha haki bawada mathaka thaba ganna.

me wanawita samajaya pura sigha්rayen wyaptha wana diyawadiyawa pilibanda awadanamak pawathi da yanna piliba`nda janathawata adahasak labaganima ilakka karaganimin sidukaranu labana siyalu parikshawan palapurudu waidya karyaya mandalayak magin sidukara ganimata fadna arunalla sayanaya sandaha sahabhagiwuwanta awasthawa udawiya.
ayi eyalata nagare pasal walata yanna bari kiyala.
lakwasiyan washayen poduwe gathkala apata uddama wannata tharam dewal me wasaredi athi nowe.
ee ‘dhba’pa cha rchababagnyapa dhata eedathagnya’ chithrapatayen.
samanyayen ape jana samajaye saha atham sanskruthikamaya pili ganim anuwa maranayata path wu pudgalayekuge wala damu sirurak nawatha goda ganima sidu nokala yuththak.
jangama kshariya oksijan wanija paddhathi samanyayen wanija trelarayak ho aathmarakshaka trak ratha wedikawak matha godanaga atha.
ee kes eka ehemama giya.
meka machan mata mage yaluwekge thaththage miththrayo set ekak gana uu kiyapu wistharayak nisa liyanna hithune.
namuth ma danna tharamin wasthu widyawa kiyana wishaya kotasa thula api katha karannata gath karanawa gana kisima sandahanak naha.
api denna witharak nawathuna thana nawathuna widiyata innawa

pi්raya biriya en. bi. sumithra saha puthun dedena wana amil, chandana, darshanath wisheshayen mage munuburu chanuka sandip me hamoma wiwidha kshethrawalin kalawama sambandha wi sitinawa.kalawa wruththiyak kara gatha yuththe ape hakiyawan apima hari hati handuna gaththata pasuwayi.

namuth me maha purushayo handawata gedara giya wita bath thamba denu labanne kuweniyage parapure ada jiwathwana gahanunya.
me melowa wasiyaku da, noese nam sura lowin basa aa grika dewiyaku da yana wichikichchawa ma sitha thula janitha wuna.
umaoya wyapruthiye sewakayin wirodhathawaka-widiyo
siril mama kiwwe we guwera karayo kiyala.biri karolisge pawula kiwwe keju hora kiyala.ee haththa gananwala.asu nawayen patan gaththa bhishane dakinna ee aya jiwathwela hitiye na.
menna eka wargayak.
nathinam eya baya wenawa” “ayiyo…

udaharanayak washayen, adhikaranayata apahasa wana karunu pala kirima gana eka thanaka awawada karana athare, ‘widhayakaye, adhikaranaye saha wyawasthadayakaye supilipan bhawayata hani wiya haki’ wani, bol saha nopahadili yedum matha padanam wemin, thawath thahanam kirim panaweyi.

siya mama, bandaranayaka agamathithuma samanga eda kuda diyaniyaka lesa surathal wu lakmani, mama samanga age athdakim wisthara karannata wuwaya.
mama ewalema bas eke naga guwan widuli karyalayata giyemi.

1972 janaraja wyawasthawata pera uththara manthri mandalaya (senet sabhawa) saha niyojitha manthri mandalaya lesa dwi mandala kramayak kriyathmaka wu parlimenthuwe senet sabha senkolaya warthamanaye bhawithayata noganunada me aithihasika sankethaya parlimenthuwe suwishesha kauthuka bhandayak lesa itha surakshithawa thanpath kara atha.
adhiwegi margaye anathuruwalata hethuwa soya aanduwata bana wadimaya.wipakshaya monawa kiwath aanduwe sanwardhana wada nathara wanne natha.
maha sangharathnaye pirith sanynyayana madhyaye aluyama hatharapasuwi miniththu hathalishatharata yedunu subha mohothin dakunu dishawa bala panasa wrukshaya kapima siduwiya.
miranda hemalathage pada rachanayen , malani bulathsinhala gayana kala “me rata mage rata ma ipaduna rata“ ee githayayi.
jaredge siya josaf kushnar nasinge yudew samulaghathana samaye belarusiyawe sita amerikawata sankramanaya wu oothodoks judagama adahana yudewweki.
dewa wandanawa unandu nokarana dahamak wechchi bududahama thulin pawa owun nirmanaya karagannawa wandana karanna dewal (uda- chaithyaya, bodhiya, dhathun wahansela).
eheth, ranil-maithri sandhanayak ...
kimbaul hamak thiyenne.
noyekuth kriyakarikayanta upadeshakayanta nithi wenas karanna kiyala balapam karanna puluwan namuth sinamawatath api yanna oona.
me nisa ma ema wahana mila di ganna paribhogikayanta wattam sahitha wa itha honda pahasukam rasak laba denawa.
anupama akka hinawenawa.
hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata shri lanka podujana peramune nayakathwaya bara ganna lesa idiriyedi yojana karana bawa ema
enisa ewani danumak puthuta enne eekanayaka mudalinduge parani iganwimwalin wiya yuthu bawayi.
aagama boho dena pawasanuye “buddhagama” “aagamak nowa” “darshanayak” bawaya.
eksath jathika pakshaye nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha samanga ekwi kathanayakawaraya wenama wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka kala.
ane ithin roboge atha aayith diga arila tikak sarata kane parak puthata waduna...

yapanaye dhiwara nayakayan amathiwaraya hamuwimata gos aththe dakune dhiwarayan uthuru muhudata pamina thahanam dhiwara aampanna bhawitha karana namuth owunwa athadanguwata nogena uthure dhiwarayan pamanak athadanguwata ganima sidu karana bawa pawasimataya.

eksath rajadhaniye shri lanka mahakomasaris amari wijewardhana mahathmiya siya dhurayen illa aswuye yayi widesha katayuthu amathyanshayelekamwaraya prakasha kala bawata janamadhya thula sansaranaya wana wartha sawadya ya.
wisheshithama siduwima wuye masa kihipayakata pera amathya dhurayen nerapa siti wijedasa rajapaksha mahatha agamathi ranil wikramasinhata sahaya pala kara sitimaya.

methana sarwis ekath godak hondayi.
lankawe wasana apata pol amuthuwen handunwadiya yuthu natha.

mewani pudgalayan pilibanda wadi wishwasayak nathi ayawalun, owunta ee sandaha awashya karana deshapalanika thalluwa nosapayena bawath, samajaye atuwam bassa wruththiya deshapalagnyayan perala damimata tharam janatha sahayak owunta nathi bawath penwa diya hakiya.

ee anuwa api dikwalle pansalak idiripita wu kiri kadayak langa nawathwuyemu.
chithrapata nam dekaka witharayi sangitha adhyakshanaya kale.
ehidi mulinma yojana wanne shad shasthruwarun genwa meyata piliyamak yedimayi.
shekshpiyar wani awadhanayak yodanne ohu pathrayange katata dena bhasha wilasaya kerehiya.
eda premadasa mahaththaya labadun pasal nila anduma, diwa aaharaya api digatama dunna.
shri lankawe haritha sankalpaya kriyathmaka wishwawidyala athara kalaniya wishwawidyalaya mul thanata pathwiya.
thaman wenadata ekkan yana dedenama nositi nisa game laga patha gedaraka wenath kenek (api ohuta siridasa kiyamuko) ekkagena giya.
memagin maha aneka wisanyojanaya weyi. 90 dashakaya aarambhayedi ‘wibhawiya’ namin sanskruthika saha deshapalanika aayathanayak bihi wiya.
“lamayi, labana brahaspathinda ra 10ta swadhina rupawahiniye mage albam eke wadasatahana penwanawa.”

methanadi sihiyata aawe budu samaye iganwimak.adhyapanaya labiya yuthu wagema labadiya yuthu aakaraya gana budun wahanse pulul arthakathana idiripath kara thibenawa.in karunu kihipayak mehema dakwanna puluwan.

pada yathrawata sahabhagiwu shri lanka nidahas paksha manthriwarun sandaha ehi mahalekam ganna winaya kriyamarga pilibandawa balagena sitina bawath diyapatta ena thuru pada yathra gos aanduwa peraliya nohaki bawata janapathi maithripala sirisena mahatha kala prakashaya ohuge prakashayak pamanak wena bawath mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sandahan kaleya.
arawinda kumar saha suresh wadiwel yana mahathwarun athupa parlimenthu manthi්rawarun kihipa denekuda mema sathyaga්rahayata ekwi thibe.
rupawahini lama dina wadasatahana, rupawahini lama eekakaye udantha gunathilakage nishpadanayak.
apith wahallu nisa jiwana bara koyi tharam thibunath, ee baratath kara denawa.
obe pudgalikathwaya aaraksha kara atha.
banku, nishpadana aayathana athulu lowa pura pradhana pele aayathana thathwaya samaga dhanathmakawa katayuthu karannata uthsaha karamin sitinabawatada wartha wemin thibenawa.
lokayama itha dushkara thaththwayakata muhuna di thibena me mohothe ithama kalpanakariwa duradiga bala katayuthu karanna kiya ma illa sitinawa.”
aya niwase dawal kalaye sitinne wayowruddha muththa samaga bawath niwase wenath aya dawalta nathi bawath danagena thibe.
